trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Use the Audit Log
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Use the Audit Log

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the audit log in the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the audit log in the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Use the Audit Log
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Use the Audit Log

trans-unit.source: Using the Audit Log
trans-unit.target: Using the Audit Log

trans-unit.source: You can use the Privileged Identity Management audio log to see all of the user assignments and activations within a given time period.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Privileged Identity Management audio log to see all of the user assignments and activations within a given time period.

trans-unit.source: Navigating to the Audit Log
trans-unit.target: Navigating to the Audit Log

trans-unit.source: You can access the audit log by clicking Audit history in the PIM dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can access the audit log by clicking Audit history in the PIM dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The Audit Log Graph
trans-unit.target: The Audit Log Graph

trans-unit.source: You can use the audit log view the total activations, max activations per day, and average activations per day in a line graph.
trans-unit.target: You can use the audit log view the total activations, max activations per day, and average activations per day in a line graph.

trans-unit.source: You can also filter the data by role if there is more than one role in the audit history.
trans-unit.target: You can also filter the data by role if there is more than one role in the audit history.

trans-unit.source: Sort by time, action, or role using the **time**, **action** or **role** buttons.
trans-unit.target: Sort by time, action, or role using the **time**, **action** or **role** buttons.

trans-unit.source: The Audit Log List
trans-unit.target: The Audit Log List

trans-unit.source: The columns in the audit log list are:
trans-unit.target: The columns in the audit log list are:

trans-unit.source: **Requestor** - who requested the role activation.
trans-unit.target: **Requestor** - who requested the role activation.

trans-unit.source: **User** - the user of the role activation.
trans-unit.target: **User** - the user of the role activation.

trans-unit.source: **Role** - the role assigned to the user.
trans-unit.target: **Role** - the role assigned to the user.

trans-unit.source: **Action** - the actions taken with the role/user.
trans-unit.target: **Action** - the actions taken with the role/user.

trans-unit.source: **Time** - when the action occurred.
trans-unit.target: **Time** - when the action occurred.

trans-unit.source: **Reasoning** - if any text was entered into the reason field during activation, it will show up here.
trans-unit.target: **Reasoning** - if any text was entered into the reason field during activation, it will show up here.

trans-unit.source: **Expiration** - if the expiration year is 9999 then the user has the role permanently.
trans-unit.target: **Expiration** - if the expiration year is 9999 then the user has the role permanently.

trans-unit.source: Filtering the Audit Log
trans-unit.target: Filtering the Audit Log

trans-unit.source: You can also filter the information that shows up in the audit log by clicking the **Filter** button.
trans-unit.target: You can also filter the information that shows up in the audit log by clicking the **Filter** button.

trans-unit.source: The **Update chart parameters blade** will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Update chart parameters blade** will appear.

trans-unit.source: Change the date range
trans-unit.target: Change the date range

trans-unit.source: Change the time range of the audit log by selecting one of the **Today**, **Past Week**, **Past Month**, or **Custom** buttons.
trans-unit.target: Change the time range of the audit log by selecting one of the **Today**, **Past Week**, **Past Month**, or **Custom** buttons.

trans-unit.source: When you choose the **Custom** button, you will be given a **From** date field and a **To** date field to specify the range of dates wanted for the log.
trans-unit.target: When you choose the **Custom** button, you will be given a **From** date field and a **To** date field to specify the range of dates wanted for the log.

trans-unit.source: You can either enter the dates in MM/DD/YYYY format or click on the **calendar** icon and choose the date from a calendar.
trans-unit.target: You can either enter the dates in MM/DD/YYYY format or click on the **calendar** icon and choose the date from a calendar.

trans-unit.source: Change the roles included in the log
trans-unit.target: Change the roles included in the log

trans-unit.source: Check or uncheck the **Role** checkbox next to each role you want included or excluded from the log.
trans-unit.target: Check or uncheck the **Role** checkbox next to each role you want included or excluded from the log.

trans-unit.source: Once you have all the filters for the audit log set, click update to filter the data in the log.
trans-unit.target: Once you have all the filters for the audit log set, click update to filter the data in the log.

trans-unit.source: If the data doesn't appear right away, click the **Refresh** button.
trans-unit.target: If the data doesn't appear right away, click the **Refresh** button.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps
